title: Driver's license required
context: §291C-194 Driver&rsquo;s license required. (a) No person shall drive a moped unless the person: (1) Possesses a valid driver&rsquo;s license of any category listed in section 286-102 or 286-239; and (2) Meets the requirements of section 286-105(3). (b) The driver of a moped shall, upon the demand of a police officer, exhibit the driver&rsquo;s driver&rsquo;s license or instruction permit. &copy; Any person who is convicted of violating this section shall be subject to penalties as provided under section 291C-161(b) and [(f)]. [L 1978, c 175, pt of §15; am L 1979, c 107, §1; gen ch 1985; am L 1998, c 86, §1; am L 2002, c 37, §2]
